job_purpose: The Data Engineer role at The Perth Mint involves working with project and data & analytics teams to ensure alignment with project and enterprise goals, extracting, transforming, and loading data using Azure, SQL, and other technologies, improving data quality and reliability, designing and implementing process improvements, building analytical tools for key business metrics, and contributing to the Corporation's data architecture and standards.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Work with Project and Data & Analytics teams to align project and enterprise goals and solutions
Extract, transform, and load data using Azure, SQL, and other technologies
Assemble large, complex data sets meeting business and project requirements
Improve data quality, integrity, and reliability across the Corporation's data
Design and implement internal process improvements for scalability and automation
Build analytical tools for key business performance metrics
Contribute to the Corporation's Data Architecture and standards
required_qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Data Engineering, Analytics, Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related discipline
Experience with Microsoft Azure Data and Machine Learning services, Azure Data Factory, AzureML, data orchestration, and data visualization tools
Experience with SQL Server and PostgreSQL
company_details: The Perth Mint is an iconic Western Australian organization with a global presence, known for refining, designing, producing, and distributing precious metal products worldwide. The organization values diversity, inclusion, sustainability, and employee well-being, offering competitive salaries, flexible work options, extended leave, training opportunities, and various employee resource groups.
